trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event to provide custom value conversion from a user-specified value to a value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>eventos para fornecer a conversão do valor personalizado de um valor especificado para um utilizador para um valor no tipo especificado pelo célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>eventos, pode converter o valor por si ou pode personalizar a conversão de predefinição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with type converters of your choosing.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode converter o valor utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo à sua escolha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, pode permitir que o tipo predefinido conversores analisar o valor, mas modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o que é inicializada utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.InheritedCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando converter o valor por si, substitua o valor inicial, formatado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade com o valor convertido no tipo especificado pelo célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para indicar que não são necessárias mais análise, é necessário, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is parsed using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> method with default type converters.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processador de eventos for concluído, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>é `null` ou não é do tipo correto, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>propriedade é `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>é analisada utilizando a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A>método com conversores de tipo predefinido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ParseFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the value using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style passed in.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida deste método analisa o valor a utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>as propriedades de estilo de célula transmitido suplemento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, the value is parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the type converters passed in.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não for igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, o valor é analisado utilizando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>propriedade e os conversores de tipo passados suplemento</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a conversão de um valor de célula para um valor formatado para apresentação, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor.

trans-unit.source: The type of the new value.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do valor novo.

trans-unit.source: The style applied to the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O estilo aplicado à célula que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell data that requires parsing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de coluna dos dados de célula, que requer a análise.

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade ColumnIndex para obter um índice para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice de coluna da célula que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style applied to the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo aplicado à célula editada.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the formatting in effect for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar a formatação em vigor para a célula.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property or changing the properties of the object that this property returns has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A> is `false` when the event handler exits.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade ou alterar as propriedades do objeto que esta propriedade devolve não tem qualquer efeito exceto se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>é `false` quando sai o processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventArgs.ParsingApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style are used to parse the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>Propriedades de estilo de célula são utilizadas para analisar o valor de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the current style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo atual da célula a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a cell's value has been successfully parsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o valor de uma célula foi analisado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler> sets the ParsingApplied property to indicate whether the new cell value was successfully parsed and no further conversion is necessary.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler>define a propriedade ParsingApplied para indicar se o novo valor de célula foi analisado com êxito e nenhuma conversão adicional é necessário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's value has been successfully parsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da célula foi analisado com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that requires parsing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de linha da célula que requer a análise.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade RowIndex para obter um índice para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que foi alterada.
